MajorClaims.Text: spending the budget for space exploration is an important activity to save living of humanity in the future
spending budget for space exploring is not the waste budget

Claims.Text: it may helps to save civilization of humanity
it is very significant to find a new place for living in other planets
space exploration will use as a military power for many countries

Premises.Text: Many governments believe that space exploration is an activity that wastes the budget
the essential challenge of humanity in the future would be the discovery of a new place for the living
In during history, our planet is threatening by many of other planets or stars and it is an enormous danger for living of humanity
In 20th century, although human being succeeded to achieve out of space by means of new technologies such as rockets, but finding a new place for living in another planet is impossible until now
In the future, many countries will try to prevent attach of other countries by using and invention new missiles
Both countries tried to send man to the moon and show their power to each other
In the past, the space race happened between the United Stated and the Soviet Union
Space exploration has used as a tools for military power in the cold war
